com.google.code.rees.scope.conversation.context
Interface ConversationContext

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>, MonitoredContext<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultConversationContext
public interface ConversationContext
extends MonitoredContext<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>

The context in which the conversation-scoped beans are placed. There is a separate context for each instance of each conversation.

Author:
rees.byars
